INSTALL_MSG:
Done.
*Make sure you have the standard weather cog unloaded.!!201809 Wunderground will no longer provide free weather API keys!!

NAME: weatherMs
SHORT: A modified version of the community's weather cog. by rfilkins1992, Dex & Will.
DESCRIPTION:
To improve our services and enhance our relationship with our users, we will no longer provide free weather API keys
--wunderground.
Returns the temp/humidity information in a given location.
Requires API key obtainable from www.wunderground.com/weather/api/
